title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 2688/94 of 4 November 1994 fixing for the 1994/95 marketing year the reference prices for broad-leaved (Batavian) endives
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 2688/94 of 4 November 1994 fixing for the 1994/95 marketing year the reference prices for broad-leaved (Batavian) endives
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
For the 1994/95 marketing year, the reference prices for broad-leaved (Batavian) endives (CN code ex 0705 29 00), expressed in ecus per 100 kilograms net of packed products of class I, of all sizes, shall be as follows:
